net.sf.mmm.search.api.config

Interface SearchConfiguration

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SearchEngineConfiguration, SearchIndexerConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSearchConfigurationBean, SearchConfigurationBean, SearchEngineConfigurationBean, SearchIndexerConfigurationBean

    public interface SearchConfiguration
    This is the interface for the configuration of the entire search (e.g. for the SearchEngine).
    You will typically provide your configuration as XML in the default configuration file. The base-implementation comes with an according (un)marshaler.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION_URL
      The default location of the configuration for the search.

      • getSource

        SearchSource getSource(String id)
        This method gets the SearchSource with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - is the ID of the requested SearchSource.
        Returns:
        the requested SearchSource or null if none is configured for the given id.
